name: Pumpkin King Is Dead
description:
THE PUMPKIN IS DEAD! You're the only survivor after the war, you've located where they're keeping Pumpkin King, But there's a problem.... he's locked up in some kind of contraption. You can hear him calling for help, even though he's dead. You don't know if it's just hallucinations or reality, but it doesn't matter. You've studied the floor plans and you believe you can get bring him back like Frankenstein if you just rewire the power to him. It's up to you to bring him back to life by connecting all the power back to Pumpkin King. 

The Pumpkin Kingdom has fallen, The king is dead...

Made for Lost Relic Games Game Jam 2022 (June). The Game theme is "CONNECTION". Check out Lost Relic Games on Youtube!

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

Mouse - Look around

Right Click - do action

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Sprint

Escape - Quit Game

Software Used:

Game Engine  - Unreal Engine 4

3D Modeling - Autodesk Maya, Zbrush, Houdini

Texturing - Substance Designer, Substance Painter

Additional Graphics - Photoshop, Marmoset Toolbag,

Credits:

All Programming - PumpkinKingGames

All Art - PumpkinKingGames

Music - "Atmospheres & Elements" - Sam Hardman Audio (Unreal Engine MarketPlace)

***PLEASE RATE MY GAME!***
